name: Discover HIDDEN Youtube Trends / Outlier Videos in Your Niche (Apify + Airtable)

user.name: Nasser
user.bio: Data Engineer, now automating processes mostly with n8n, Make and code

description:
## For Who?

- Content Creators
- Youtube Automation 
- Marketing Team

---
## How it works?

**1 -** Every week, retrieve the keywords you want to track
**2 -** Thanks to Apify, scrape videos from YouTube Search related to these keywords, filtered by relevance
**3 -** Wait until the dataset is completed
**4 -** Get the information contained in the dataset
**5 -** For each video, clean and summarize the script
**6 -** Upload everything to your Airtable database

**üì∫¬†YouTube Video Tutorial:** 
[![Watch on YouTube](https://img.youtube.com/vi/pH2hVaij3FY/maxresdefault.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pH2hVaij3FY)

---
## Setup (~5min)

**Scheduled Trigger:** Select the frequency you want. If you change it, update the data accordingly in the "Create Videos Dataset" HTTP Request node in Body ‚û°Ô∏è JSON ‚û°Ô∏è dateFilter.

**Setup Keywords:** Enter keywords related to the niche you want. If you change the number of keywords, update the data accordingly in the "Create Videos Dataset" HTTP Request node in Body ‚û°Ô∏è JSON ‚û°Ô∏è searchQueries.

**Create Videos Dataset:** Refer to the Apify documentation for more: [https://docs.apify.com/api/v2/getting-started](https://docs.apify.com/api/v2/getting-started)

**APIs:** For all HTTP Request nodes in the URL field, replace `[YOUR_API_TOKEN]` with your API token.

---
üë®‚Äçüíª¬†**More Workflows :** [https://n8n.io/creators/nasser/](https://n8n.io/creators/nasser/)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
    "dateFilter": "week",
    "downloadSubtitles": true,
    "hasCC": false,
    "hasLocation": false,
    "hasSubtitles": false,
    "is360": false,
    "is3D": false,
    "is4K": false,
    "isBought": false,
    "isHD": false,
    "isHDR": false,
    "isLive": false,
    "isVR180": false,
    "lengthFilter": "between420",
    "maxResultStreams": 0,
    "maxResults": 3,
    "maxResultsShorts": 0,
    "preferAutoGeneratedSubtitles": false,
    "saveSubsToKVS": false,
    "searchQueries": [
        "{{ $json.keyword1 }}",
        "{{ $json.keyword2 }}",
        "{{ $json.keyword3 }}"
    ],
    "sortingOrder": "relevance",
    "subtitlesLanguage": "en"
}

parameters.content:
## SETUP

**Scheduled Trigger :** Select the Frequency you want. If you change it, update the data accordingly in the "Create Videos Dataset" HTTP Request Node in Body ‚û°Ô∏è JSON ‚û°Ô∏è dateFilter.


**Setup Keywords :** Enter Keyword Related to the niche you want. If you change the number of keywords, update the data accordingly in the "Create Videos Dataset" HTTP Request Node in Body ‚û°Ô∏è JSON ‚û°Ô∏è searchQueries.

**Create Videos Dataset :** Refer to the Apify Documentation for more https://docs.apify.com/api/v2/getting-started

**APIs :** For all HTTP Request node in the URL field, replace [YOUR_API_TOKEN] with your API Token.

messageValues.message:
=You are a summarization assistant.  Given a transcript of a YouTube video, your task is to summarize the content using only information found in the transcript, do not invent, infer, or add anything beyond what is said.  Structure your output as follows: 

1. Intro how the video begins or introduces the topic.  Don't do any modification on this part. 

2. Structure of the Video A breakdown of the video‚Äôs flow using bullet points: 
Major Points: The main topics or arguments discussed.  
Subpoints: Supporting details, examples, or smaller elements related to each major point. Use indentation or clear labeling to distinguish between major points and their related subpoints.

parameters.content:
## How this is Working ?
**1 -** Every Week retrieve Keywords you want to track
**2 -** Thanks to Apify, scrap video from Youtube Search related to these Keywords filtered by relevance
**3 -** Wait until the Dataset is completed
**4 -** Get the Information contained in the Dataset
**5 -** For each Video, clean and summarize the script
**6 -** Upload everything in your Airtable Database

**üì∫ Youtube Video Tutorial : https://youtu.be/pH2hVaij3FY**
**üõ†Ô∏è Need Help with Your Workflows ? https://tally.so/r/wayeqB**
**üë®‚Äçüíª¬†More Workflows : https://n8n.io/creators/nasser/**

## Airtable DB Fields
**1 -** Video Link (ID)
**2 -** Video Title
**3 -** Channel Name
**4 -** Thumbnail ‚¨áÔ∏è
To Upload an Image on Airtable Attachement Field you need an Array of the URL in this format : {{ [{ "url": $json.thumbnail}] }}
**5 -** Views Count
**6 -** Subs Count
**7 -** Comments Count
**8 -** Duration
**9 -** Structure
**10 -** VSC Ratio ‚¨áÔ∏è
Formula :(ViewsCount/SubsCount)*0.7 + (CommentsCount/ViewsCount)*0.3)
